data.text: @VicGovDH F*ck yourself.. you forced it on people. I couldn't even WATCH my kid play hockey with out getting injected with bullshit. I moved my family far away from your shit city and province.

@Robby42186095 @N_J_Bennett @VicGovDH You brought have up children along with masks lol the whole basis of my tweet was based around  Ozsage school opening Armageddon failure. Majority of children wear cotton masks. Don't rewrite history lol https://t.co/W7BBJf7THU
@VicGovDH How many lives lost in Ukraine today?
@TenXTrader @N_J_Bennett @VicGovDH At no point was I confused. You were the one who brought up cloth masks not me.
@TenXTrader @Robby42186095 @VicGovDH True Scotsman + strawman + ad hominem + non sequitur = weak, the more you throw in the weaker it is
@N_J_Bennett @Robby42186095 @VicGovDH Wrong again Nicholas, this must be the most engagement you've had for the past 2 years lol get some rest. Tomorrow will another copy pasta day for you at 9am

@TenXTrader @Robby42186095 @VicGovDH No you want to have a strawman argument, Rob is talking about "masking" not mandates or the bad mask choice one can make and stay within the letter of a mandate. Lame argument.
@TenXTrader @Robby42186095 @VicGovDH I skimmed it, check it out!
@N_J_Bennett @Robby42186095 @VicGovDH You didn't read the article either Nicholas lol
